00002 #define KWAY_CONSTRAINT_MGR_BASE_HPP
00003 
00004 #include <Cell.hpp>
00005 #include <FMMoveInfo.hpp>
00006 #include <boost/array.hpp>
00007 
00016 class KWayConstrMgrBase
00017 {
00018 protected:
00019   static const unsigned int _M = 64;
00020 
00022   KWayConstrMgrBase(unsigned int K) : _K(K), _knownSatisfiedAll(false) {}  
00023 
00025   ~KWayConstrMgrBase() {}
00026 
00028   unsigned int getNumPartitions() const { return _K; }
00029 
00030 public:
00032   int getMaxDiff() const;
00033 
00035   int getAllowDiff() const { return _upperBound - _lowerBound; }
00036 
00038   int getUpperBound() const { return _upperBound; }
00039 
00041   int getLowerBound() const { return _lowerBound; }
00042 
00044   void setUpperBound(int upperBound) { _upperBound = upperBound; }
00045 
00047   void setLowerBound(int lowerBound) { _lowerBound = lowerBound; }
00048 
00050   boost::array<int,64>& getDiff() { return _diff; }
00051 
00053   const boost::array<int,64>& getDiff() const { return _diff; }
00054 
00056   void setDiff(const boost::array<int,64>& diff) 
00057   { 
00058     setDiff2(diff);
00059     _knownSatisfiedAll = false;
00060   }
00061 
00063   void setDiff2(const boost::array<int,64>& diff) 
00064   { 
00065     for (unsigned int k=0; k<getNumPartitions(); ++k) _diff[k] = diff[k];
00066   }
00067 
00069   void updateMove(const FMMoveInfo& moveInfo)
00070   {
00071     const unsigned int weight = moveInfo._cell->getWeight();
00072     _diff[moveInfo._toPart] += weight;
00073     _diff[moveInfo._fromPart] -= weight;
00074   }
00075 
00082   bool satisfiedAll(const boost::array<int,64>& diff) 
00083   { 
00084     /* In the current implementation, once the partitions are
00085        legalized, they will remain legal for all later moves. */
00086     if (_knownSatisfiedAll) return true;
00087 
00088     for (unsigned int k=0; k<getNumPartitions(); ++k) {
00089       if (diff[k] < _lowerBound || diff[k] > _upperBound) return false;
00090     }
00091 
00092     _knownSatisfiedAll = true;
00093     return true;
00094   }
00095 
00102   bool satisfiedOK()
00103   { 
00104     return satisfiedAll();
00105   }
00106 
00113   bool satisfiedAll() { return satisfiedAll(_diff); }
00114 
00115   bool toOk(unsigned int k) const { return _diff[k] + 30 < _upperBound; }
00116 
00117   bool fromOk(unsigned int k) const { return _diff[k] - 30 > _lowerBound; }
00118 
00119 protected:
00120   boost::array<int,64> _diff;  
00121   unsigned int _K;             
00122   int _upperBound;             
00123   int _lowerBound;             
00124   bool _knownSatisfiedAll;     
00125 };
00126 
00129 #endif
